introduction.short: I'm a software developer who can work well on every development layer. I live next to Brasília, Brazil. I work as a full-stack developer at <0>{{company}}</0>. I'm currently not seeking job opportunities. However, my inbox it's always open to chat about any topic.

about.title: Who I Am
about.first: Hey there, my name is Artur. I enjoy creating things. My first contact with code was with Game Maker when I was 14, which made me fall in love with development. Since then, I have been passing through some technologies and other fields of software development.

second.game: I enjoy playing video games for as far as I can remember. When I discovered that I could also make them it was a game-changer in my life. Since college, I have been having fun developing some. I have spent some years doing it professionally but nowadays is more of a hobby.
second.web: Although I am a full-stack web developer who can work perfectly with both the back and front end, lately, I've been working mainly with the "muscles" of the interfaces. I'm used to building APPs with available UI kits. However, when required, I design as well. On the server side, I care a lot about security and following good practices to prevent future problems.

about.third: I love dogs, music and pizza. In my free time, I enjoy going to the gym, playing video games and coding small projects.
about.technologies: Technologies that I have been using lately:

roundstars.title: Game Developer
roundstars.subtitle: Programmer
roundstars.content: Worked on single-player and multiplayer games, coding mechanics, AI bots, and interfaces. Contributed to a REST API for a gaming social media platform.

adra_brasil.title: Designer
adra_brasil.subtitle: Automation & Design
adra_brasil.content: Created art for fundraising campaigns, automated daily tasks, and developed a system to support food distribution for Venezuelan refugees.

adven_tech.title: Web Developer
adven_tech.subtitle: Fullstack
adven_tech.content: Developed web apps for stock management, events, and e-commerce. Migrated legacy systems and delivered scalable, maintainable solutions.

autotrac.title: Web Developer
autotrac.subtitle: Front-end Focused
autotrac.content: Built and improved Angular interfaces, adding features, refactoring components, and ensuring performance. Contributed to .NET back-end integration.

iesb.title: Associate Degree
iesb.subtitle: Game Development
iesb.content: Studied programming, art, and design in game development. Won an award for best game in 2017, also gained experience in web and app development.

descomplica_systems.title: Postgraduate
descomplica_systems.subtitle: Systems Analysis
descomplica_systems.content: Studied data structures, project management, DevOps, and theoretical aspects of system development.

descomplica_mobile.title: Postgraduate
descomplica_mobile.subtitle: Mobile Development
descomplica_mobile.content: Focused on hybrid frameworks and fundamentals of native iOS and Android apps.

computer_science.title: Bachelor’s Degree
computer_science.subtitle: Computer Science
computer_science.content: Studied algorithms, data structures, operating systems, software engineering, databases, and computer networks. Gained solid knowledge in programming, problem solving, and system design, preparing for roles in software development and technology innovation.

projects.title: Projects
projects.instructions: Hover the project card to see its links.
projects.instructions_mobile: Tap on the project card to see its links.

todo.name: ToDo App
todo.description: It's a simple To-Do app. I made it mainly to show my technical knowledge of the Angular framework. It has unit tests for basic functionalities, is mobile-first designed, has PWA support, and uses firebase's realtime database.

trivia.name: Trivia Game
trivia.description: It is a simple quiz game powered by Open Trivia Database. It allows you to choose a topic, time limit and others settings to customize your experience.

secret_santa.name: Secret Santa
secret_santa.description: This one might be the simplest here. I made it to help with my family's holiday Secret Santa. It allows you quick create one and send the links to the participants so they can see who they got.

portfolio.name: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Its main objective is to show some of my projects and talk a little about me. It uses SendingBlue for contact and a single cloud function to keep it safe.

pru.name: Pru!
pru.description: Pru! is an "infinity runner" of a pigeon who needs to eat food and score by hitting people with its poop while avoiding obstacles. It was the first game that I made back in college. It has gone through some changes since I first thought about it.

jimmy_gunner.name: Jimmy Gunner
jimmy_gunner.description: It is a twin stick shooter that I made while playing with voxel art back in college. It is the game that gave me the best game of the semester award. I tried to remade it some years later but left this idea aside because of the number of similar games available.

slime_run.name: Slime Run
slime_run.description: This game is about a world invaded by slimes. The hero's job is to get rid of them by jumping on their head while running, gliding and collecting coins to be used later on outfits.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Feel free to contact me and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

submit_success.title: Email successfully sent!
submit_success.description: Thanks for the message. I'll do my best to answer you on {{email}} as soon as possible.

submit_error.title: I'm sorry, looks like the email couldn't be sent right now.
submit_error.description: But don't worry you can try again later or email me on

contact.disabled_notice: I'm sorry, I had to disable the contact form. If you want to talk to me, please send an email to

job_instructions.text: Hi there, Even though I have been focusing on web development lately, I'm also a skilled game developer. You can click any time on "Web" or "Game" to see some changes on the page content.
